texts: {n} boops {t} right on the nose! uwu
{n} tried to boop {t}, but instead {t} booped them first!
{n} booped {t}, and {t} booped them right back! :D
boop.is_self: {n} boops themselves. This event causes a nuclear reaction equivilant to the power of 621 megatons of TNT. Over 800m people were instantly killed in the Boop Disaster. All is lost. All because {n} wanted to boop themselves.

texts: {n} nuzzles {t}! It does 20 base damage, and paralyzes them! owO
nuzzle.is_self: {n} nuzzles themselves! It does 20 base damage, and paralyzes themself! owO

texts: {n} hugs {t} tightly!
{n} hugs {t}, whispering "I love you so much, {t}"
{n} quietly wraps their arms around {t} OuO
{n} wraps their arms tight around {t}, smushing them in love and appreciation.
hug.is_self: {n} hugs themselves! They look kind of lonely...

texts: {n} grabs {t} close, and kisses them right on the snoot! uwu
{n} gives {t} a little kiss!
{n} tightly hugs {t}, before kissing them~
{t} gets pulled to the side by {n} as they smooch them right on the lips!
kiss.is_self: {n} kisses themselves! Self love is important after all OuO:+1:

texts: {n} suddenly licks {t} right across their cheek...! {t} doesn't seem all too pleased..
{n} licks {t}'s arm for no reason whatsoever. Great!
lick.is_self: {n} licks themselves! They must think they're a cat...

texts: {n} slaps {t} right across the face! Ouch.
{n} bitch-slaps {t}, saying "shut."
{n} slaps {t}, and {t} slaps them right back immediately!
{n} firmly smacks the back of {t}'s neck!
slap.is_self:
{n} slaps themselves!
*Why are you hitting yourself? Why are you hitting yourself? Why are you hitting yourself???*

texts: {n} cutely pours a full barrel of gasoline onto {t}. How cute and wholesome!
{n} throws {t} into a lit cannon, right as it's about to fire!
explode.is_self:
{n} spontaniously combusts!
As a young man once said, "*My main goal... is to blow up*"
